level.heading: Available remedies for collection of taxes and assessments.
Legislative History of Law 12-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1603.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x)through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001."
